snippet: The de Blasio administration’s issuance of municipal identification cards, to help undocumented immigrants, the homeless and others, was hampered by a broken scheduling website.
abstract: Website failure frustrates applicants for New York City's new municipal identification program on third day following its introduction; site functionality remains spotty despite efforts of city officials.
lead_paragraph: The de Blasio administration’s issuance of municipal identification cards, to help undocumented immigrants, the homeless and others, was hampered by a broken scheduling website.

headline.main: Web Failure Slows New York City’s ID Program
headline.print_headline: Web Failure Slows Start of ID Effort
